messages.msgSnippet: I m a coordinator for the Learning Freely Network.  It s a world-wide unschooling network.  I received this this morning, and thought I d pass it along. If
messages.messageBody:
I'm a coordinator for the Learning Freely Network. It's a world-wide
unschooling network. I received this this morning, and thought I'd pass it
along.
If anyone is interested in joining me as a coordinator, please consider it
and contact Kent, at the altlearn@... addy.

Blessings,
Karen

---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: <altlearn@...>
Date: Jan 13, 2008 10:04 AM
Subject: [LFN] Breaking News
To: thuisonderwijs@yahoogroups.com, scottishhome-ed@yahoogroups.com
Cc: thuisonderwijs@yahoogroups.com, Learning Freely <
LearningFreely@yahoogroups.com>, Unschooling_Canada@yahoogroups.com,
lereninvrijheid@yahoogroups.com, learning-unlimited@yahoogroups.com,
australianunschoolers@yahoogroups.com, scottishhome-ed@yahoogroups.com


Hello All,

<
http://www.learningfreely.net/index.php/2008/01/13/homeschooling-a-crime-in-germany/>Homeschooling

a Crime in Germany

In Germany, enveloped in the EU, it will soon be a crime to
homeschool children.

http://www.learningfreely.net/index.php/2008/01/13/homeschooling-a-crime-in-germany/

Kent
Learning Freely News

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]





--
"When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know
peace."
Jimi Hendrix
